name: FastQTools Dev
initializeCommand: bash -lc "H=\"${HOME:-}\"; if [ -z \"$H\" ] && command -v getent >/dev/null 2>&1; then H=\"$(getent passwd $(id -un) | cut -d: -f6)\"; fi; if [ -n \"$H\" ]; then if [ -d \"$H/.gitconfig\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: ~/.gitconfig 是目录，会导致 devcontainer bind mount 失败，请删除该目录并改为文件。' >&2; exit 1; fi; if [ ! -e \"$H/.gitconfig\" ]; then touch \"$H/.gitconfig\"; fi; if [ -d \"$H/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: ~/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig 是目录，会导致 devcontainer bind mount 失败，请删除该目录并改为文件。' >&2; exit 1; fi; if [ ! -e \"$H/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig\" ]; then touch \"$H/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig\"; fi; cp -f \"$H/.gitconfig\" \"$H/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig\"; if [ -e \"$H/.fastqtools-host-claude\" ] && [ ! -d \"$H/.fastqtools-host-claude\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: ~/.fastqtools-host-claude 不是目录，会导致 devcontainer 挂载失败，请删除该文件并改为目录。' >&2; exit 1; fi; if [ -e \"$H/.fastqtools-host-codex\" ] && [ ! -d \"$H/.fastqtools-host-codex\" ]; then echo 'ERROR: ~/.fastqtools-host-codex 不是目录，会导致 devcontainer 挂载失败，请删除该文件并改为目录。' >&2; exit 1; fi; mkdir -p \"$H/.fastqtools-host-claude\" \"$H/.fastqtools-host-codex\"; for f in CLAUDE.md settings.duck.json settings.glm.json settings.json settings.kimi.json settings.local.json settings.minimax.json settings.wong.json; do SRC=\"$H/.claude/$f\"; DST=\"$H/.fastqtools-host-claude/$f\"; if [ -f \"$SRC\" ]; then cp -f \"$SRC\" \"$DST\"; else if [ ! -e \"$DST\" ]; then : > \"$DST\"; fi; fi; done; for f in auth.json config.toml; do SRC=\"$H/.codex/$f\"; DST=\"$H/.fastqtools-host-codex/$f\"; if [ -f \"$SRC\" ]; then cp -f \"$SRC\" \"$DST\"; else if [ ! -e \"$DST\" ]; then : > \"$DST\"; fi; fi; done; fi; if [ -n \"$H\" ] && [ ! -e \"$H/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig\" ]; then touch \"$H/.fastqtools-host-gitconfig\"; fi; true"
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "cd /workspace || exit 0; if [ -z \"${WSL_DISTRO_NAME:-}\" ]; then echo 'WARNING: 建议使用 VS Code Remote - WSL 在 WSL2 中打开仓库，再执行 Reopen in Container（更稳定/更快/更一致）。' >&2; fi; if [ ! -S /ssh-agent ]; then echo 'WARNING: 未检测到 SSH agent 注入（/ssh-agent 不存在）。若需要访问私有仓库，请在 WSL 中执行：eval \"$(ssh-agent -s)\" && ssh-add，然后 Rebuild/Reopen。' >&2; fi; if [ -d /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then rm -rf /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then touch /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ -f /tmp/host-gitconfig ]; then cp -f /tmp/host-gitconfig /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -d /home/developer/.claude ]; then mkdir -p /home/developer/.claude; fi; if [ ! -d /home/developer/.codex ]; then mkdir -p /home/developer/.codex; fi; for f in CLAUDE.md settings.duck.json settings.glm.json settings.json settings.kimi.json settings.local.json settings.minimax.json settings.wong.json; do if [ -s \"/tmp/host-claude/$f\" ]; then cp -f \"/tmp/host-claude/$f\" \"/home/developer/.claude/$f\"; fi; done; for f in auth.json config.toml; do if [ -s \"/tmp/host-codex/$f\" ]; then cp -f \"/tmp/host-codex/$f\" \"/home/developer/.codex/$f\"; fi; done; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! git config --global --get-all safe.directory 2>/dev/null | grep -Fxq /workspace; then git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; fi; git config --global user.email 'jiashuai.mail@gmail.com'; git config --global user.name 'shijiashuai'; fi; if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then git config commit.template .gitmessage.txt || true; else echo 'WARNING: /workspace 不是 Git 仓库，跳过 git config commit.template。' >&2; fi; conan profile detect --force >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; bash /workspace/.devcontainer/setup-sshd.sh || true; true"
postStartCommand: bash -lc "if [ -d /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then rm -rf /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then touch /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ -f /tmp/host-gitconfig ]; then cp -f /tmp/host-gitconfig /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -d /home/developer/.claude ]; then mkdir -p /home/developer/.claude; fi; if [ ! -d /home/developer/.codex ]; then mkdir -p /home/developer/.codex; fi; for f in CLAUDE.md settings.duck.json settings.glm.json settings.json settings.kimi.json settings.local.json settings.minimax.json settings.wong.json; do if [ -s \"/tmp/host-claude/$f\" ]; then cp -f \"/tmp/host-claude/$f\" \"/home/developer/.claude/$f\"; fi; done; for f in auth.json config.toml; do if [ -s \"/tmp/host-codex/$f\" ]; then cp -f \"/tmp/host-codex/$f\" \"/home/developer/.codex/$f\"; fi; done; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! git config --global --get-all safe.directory 2>/dev/null | grep -Fxq /workspace; then git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; fi; git config --global user.email 'jiashuai.mail@gmail.com'; git config --global user.name 'shijiashuai'; fi; bash /workspace/.devcontainer/start-sshd.sh || true; true"
postAttachCommand: bash -lc "if [ -d /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then rm -rf /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -e /home/developer/.gitconfig ]; then touch /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ -f /tmp/host-gitconfig ]; then cp -f /tmp/host-gitconfig /home/developer/.gitconfig; fi; if [ ! -d /home/developer/.claude ]; then mkdir -p /home/developer/.claude; fi; if [ ! -d /home/developer/.codex ]; then mkdir -p /home/developer/.codex; fi; for f in CLAUDE.md settings.duck.json settings.glm.json settings.json settings.kimi.json settings.local.json settings.minimax.json settings.wong.json; do if [ -s \"/tmp/host-claude/$f\" ]; then cp -f \"/tmp/host-claude/$f\" \"/home/developer/.claude/$f\"; fi; done; for f in auth.json config.toml; do if [ -s \"/tmp/host-codex/$f\" ]; then cp -f \"/tmp/host-codex/$f\" \"/home/developer/.codex/$f\"; fi; done; if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then if ! git config --global --get-all safe.directory 2>/dev/null | grep -Fxq /workspace; then git config --global --add safe.directory /workspace; fi; git config --global user.email 'jiashuai.mail@gmail.com'; git config --global user.name 'shijiashuai'; fi; bash /workspace/.devcontainer/start-sshd.sh || true; true"
